name: d3-transform
description: addon to d3.js that wraps SVG transforms into an API

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-transform.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-transform.js -c -m -o build/d3-transform.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-transform.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-transform.js build/d3-transform.min.js

author: Erik Cunningham <djtrinary@gmail.com>
